title: 'Small first step': After initial trials, potential coronavirus vaccines face more tests
author: Stephen Loiaconi
description: Promising trial results and optimistic statements by pharmaceutical executives are boosting hopes that a safe and effective coronavirus vaccine could be available by the end of the year, but some experts say achieving that goal might still be a long shot. Stock markets around the world soared Wednesday morning in response to news that Moderna and the National Institutes of Health are moving toward the final stage of testing on a vaccine that has performed well in early trials.
